name: Smash Thumb
description:
Thumbs getting numb, this game is totally not a rip-off of a popular game (not by an inch) How2Play :

Each player can join the game by pressing an input (keyboard of controller) (see below). Then just enjoy :)

Controls :  Keyboard
  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • J - Simple Attack
  • K - Strong Attack
  • L - Block
Xbox Controller
  • Left-Stick - Move
  • X - Simple Attack
  • Y - Strong Attack
  • B - Block
  • A - Jump
